description: Try our easy to follow Alphabet Lunchbox recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Alphabet Lunchbox Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs tomato paste no added salt
0.25 cup reduced fat tasty cheese, grated
50g lean skinless chicken breast, cooked, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Lunch: To make capsicum, chicken & cheese pizzas, preheat oven to 200oC. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place pita bread on tray. Spread with tomato paste, then top with chicken, capsicum, cheese and olives. Bake for 1012 minutes or until golden and crisp. Set aside to cool. Cut into triangles. Place in an airtight container in fridge until ready to pack in lunch box. Makes 1 (Serves 2). Serve with the pineapple.
Snack 1: To make ants on a log, cut celery stick into thirds. Spread with cream cheese and top with currants.
Snack 2: To make yoghurt and berries, place yoghut in a cup. Mash berries and add to a snaplock bag. Snip off tip and pipe an ‘A’ on yoghurt.
